articles.author: Nick Lichtenberg
articles.title: Goldman Sachs doubles down on tariff research that infuriated Trump, saying average Americans will bear two-thirds of the costs - Fortune
articles.description: “We stand by the results of this study,” Goldman economist David Mericle told CNBC’s Squawk on the Street on Wednesday.
articles.content: Goldman Sachs is refusing to back away from its analysis that Americansnot foreign exporters or overseas governmentsare bearing the majority of costs from President Donald Trumps sweeping tariffs. Th… [+3205 chars]
